metadata.title: CVE-2021-3816 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Cacti 1.1.38 allows authenticated users with User Management permissions toinject arbitrary HTML in the group_prefix field during the creation of anew group via "Copy" method at user_group_admin.php.

criterions.comment: cacti: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
